column4: I need help with lamp! When i type in localhost in my web browser its goes to localhost/xampp but i want it to display the files in localhost... Please help!!
are you using LAMP or XAMPP
in the htdocs of XAMPP there is a file called index.html, that is forwarding you to localhost/xampp. you can remove that file and put your own in and it should work.
just to be safe, make a backup of index.html and save it somewhere else, just in case
